name: Body Parts Game
description:
BODY PARTS GAME is a simple  game which lets the user learn and practice the name, appearance and location of 12  well known internal body parts. It is a windows program and will run on windows 7 through 10.
The game is FREEWARE and may be freely distributed and installed on an unlimited number of computers. There are no ads, no registration, no tracking, no GPS and no collection of any data what so ever. Enjoy.
